hero.title: San Francisco’s Calling
hero.lead: Don't miss your chance to experience the vibrant culture and community of San Francisco at this exciting event at Fort Mason. With so much to see and do, it's sure to be a highlight of your time in the city by the bay.

thingsToDo.title: Things to do in San Francisco
thingsToDo.content: Looking for adventure, culture, and excitement in one of America's most iconic cities? Look no further than San Francisco! This vibrant city by the bay is home to a wealth of exciting activities and attractions that are sure to delight visitors of all ages and interests.

venue.title:
Where it’s
happening
venue.content:
#### Fort Mason Center

Get ready for an unforgettable experience at Fort Mason, one of San Francisco's most iconic and historic landmarks. This sprawling complex of former military buildings and warehouses is now a hub of cultural and community events, and there's no better time to experience it than during RDC.

accommodations.title: Places to stay
accommodations.content: Book your reservations in one of our RDC blocks below:

hotels.name: Hyatt Centric Fisherman's Wharf San Francisco
hotels.address: 555 North Point St, San Francisco, CA 94133
